title: Transmutations
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For the current skill that utilizes forms, see [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting"). For the current transmuting-themed school of magic, see [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy").*

The **Transmutations** school of magic governs spells that alter the shape and nature of objects, largely with your own body. The main benefit of this school is access to a wide variety of alternate forms, each of which offers unique offensive and defensive perks (and occasionally vulnerabilities), but practitioners also gain a few utility and debilitative spells as well, particularly if they are also skilled in [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic").

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)

- [2 Spells](#Spells)

  - [2.1 Level 1](#Level_1)
  - [2.2 Level 2](#Level_2)
  - [2.3 Level 3](#Level_3)
  - [2.4 Level 4](#Level_4)
  - [2.5 Level 5](#Level_5)
  - [2.6 Level 6](#Level_6)
  - [2.7 Level 7](#Level_7)
  - [2.8 Level 8](#Level_8)

- [3 Sources](#Sources)

- [4 See also](#See_also)

- [5 History](#History)

## Sources

- Main Texts

  - **[Book of Alchemy](/Book_of_Alchemy "Book of Alchemy")**: [Sublimation of Blood](/Sublimation_of_Blood "Sublimation of Blood"), [Petrify](/Petrify "Petrify"), [Irradiate](/Irradiate "Irradiate")
  - **[Book of Changes](/Book_of_Changes "Book of Changes")**: [Beastly Appendage](/Beastly_Appendage "Beastly Appendage"), [Wereblood](/Wereblood "Wereblood"), [Spider Form](/Spider_Form "Spider Form")
  - **[Book of Transfigurations](/Book_of_Transfigurations "Book of Transfigurations")**: [Irradiate](/Irradiate "Irradiate"), [Blade Hands](/Blade_Hands "Blade Hands"), [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form")

* Other Texts

  -
  - **[Great Wizards, Vol. II](/Great_Wizards,_Vol._II "Great Wizards, Vol. II")**: [Alistair's Intoxication](/Alistair%27s_Intoxication "Alistair's Intoxication"), [Eringya's Noxious Bog](/Eringya%27s_Noxious_Bog "Eringya's Noxious Bog")
  - **[Great Wizards, Vol. VII](/Great_Wizards,_Vol._VII "Great Wizards, Vol. VII")**: [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling")
  - **[Fen Folio](/Fen_Folio "Fen Folio")**: [Eringya's Noxious Bog](/Eringya%27s_Noxious_Bog "Eringya's Noxious Bog")
  - **[Young Poisoner's Handbook](/Young_Poisoner%27s_Handbook "Young Poisoner's Handbook")**: [Sting](/Sting "Sting")
  - **[Book of Blood](/Book_of_Blood "Book of Blood")**: [Wereblood](/Wereblood "Wereblood")
  - **[Book of Burglary](/Book_of_Burglary "Book of Burglary")**: [Passwall](/Passwall "Passwall")
  - **[Book of Dreams](/Book_of_Dreams "Book of Dreams")**: [Spider Form](/Spider_Form "Spider Form")
  - **[Book of Geomancy](/Book_of_Geomancy "Book of Geomancy")**: [Passwall](/Passwall "Passwall")
  - **[Book of Iron](/Book_of_Iron "Book of Iron")**: [Blade Hands](/Blade_Hands "Blade Hands")
  - **[Book of Misfortune](/Book_of_Misfortune "Book of Misfortune")**: [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling")
  - **[Book of Party Tricks](/Book_of_Party_Tricks "Book of Party Tricks")**: [Alistair's Intoxication](/Alistair%27s_Intoxication "Alistair's Intoxication")
  - **[Book of Rime](/Book_of_Rime "Book of Rime")**: [Ice Form](/Ice_Form "Ice Form")
  - **[Book of Sloth](/Book_of_Sloth "Book of Sloth")**: [Petrify](/Petrify "Petrify"), [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")
  - **[Book of Weapons](/Book_of_Weapons "Book of Weapons")**: [Blade Hands](/Blade_Hands "Blade Hands")
  - **[Book of the Dragon](/Book_of_the_Dragon "Book of the Dragon")**: [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form")
  - **[Book of the Earth](/Book_of_the_Earth "Book of the Earth")**: [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")
  - **[Book of the Sky](/Book_of_the_Sky "Book of the Sky")**: [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form")
  - **[Book of the Tundra](/Book_of_the_Tundra "Book of the Tundra")**: [Ice Form](/Ice_Form "Ice Form")
  - **[Everburning Encyclopedia](/Everburning_Encyclopedia "Everburning Encyclopedia")**: [Ignite Poison](/Ignite_Poison "Ignite Poison")
  - **[Inescapable Atlas](/Inescapable_Atlas "Inescapable Atlas")**: [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form")
  - **[Necronomicon](/Necronomicon "Necronomicon")**: [Necromutation](/Necromutation "Necromutation")
  - **[Trismegistus Codex](/Trismegistus_Codex "Trismegistus Codex")**: [Ignite Poison](/Ignite_Poison "Ignite Poison")

## See also

- [Transmuter](/Transmuter "Transmuter")

## History

- Transmutations was dissolved in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"). The form-changing spells were reworked into [talismans](/Talisman "Talisman") and the other spells were merged with [Poison Magic](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic") to create [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy").
- [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") replaced [Hydra Form](/Hydra_Form "Hydra Form") with [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form"). Transformations as a whole were affected by the [GDR](/GDR "GDR") change.
- [0.26](/0.26 "0.26") refitted [Song of Slaying](/Song_of_Slaying "Song of Slaying") ([Charms](/Charms "Charms")) to the transmutation [Wereblood](/Wereblood "Wereblood").
- [0.25](/0.25 "0.25") removed [Sticks to Snakes](/Sticks_to_Snakes "Sticks to Snakes").
- In early versions of Stone Soup, there were many more transmutations, such as [Fulsome Distillation](/Fulsome_Distillation "Fulsome Distillation"), [Evaporate](/Evaporate "Evaporate"), and [Alter Self](/Alter_Self "Alter Self").

| [Spell Schools](/List_of_spells_by_school "List of spells by school") | [Air](/Air "Air") • [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy") • [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") • [Earth](/Earth "Earth") • [Fire](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") • [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") • [Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") • [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") • [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning") • [Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations")                      |
html:
Transmutations

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For the current skill that utilizes forms, see Shapeshifting. For the current transmuting-themed school of magic, see Alchemy.

The Transmutations school of magic governs spells that alter the shape and nature of objects, largely with your own body. The main benefit of this school is access to a wide variety of alternate forms, each of which offers unique offensive and defensive perks (and occasionally vulnerabilities), but practitioners also gain a few utility and debilitative spells as well, particularly if they are also skilled in Earth Magic.

Contents

  • 1 Aptitudes
  • 2 Spells
    • 2.1 Level 1
    • 2.2 Level 2
    • 2.3 Level 3
    • 2.4 Level 4
    • 2.5 Level 5
    • 2.6 Level 6
    • 2.7 Level 7
    • 2.8 Level 8
  • 3 Sources
  • 4 See also
  • 5 History

Aptitudes

Sources

Main Texts
Book of Alchemy: Sublimation of Blood, Petrify, Irradiate
Book of Changes: Beastly Appendage, Wereblood, Spider Form
Book of Transfigurations: Irradiate, Blade Hands, Dragon Form
Other Texts
Great Wizards, Vol. II: Alistair's Intoxication, Eringya's Noxious Bog
Great Wizards, Vol. VII: Yara's Violent Unravelling
Fen Folio: Eringya's Noxious Bog
Young Poisoner's Handbook: Sting
Book of Blood: Wereblood
Book of Burglary: Passwall
Book of Dreams: Spider Form
Book of Geomancy: Passwall
Book of Iron: Blade Hands
Book of Misfortune: Yara's Violent Unravelling
Book of Party Tricks: Alistair's Intoxication
Book of Rime: Ice Form
Book of Sloth: Petrify, Statue Form
Book of Weapons: Blade Hands
Book of the Dragon: Dragon Form
Book of the Earth: Statue Form
Book of the Sky: Storm Form
Book of the Tundra: Ice Form
Everburning Encyclopedia: Ignite Poison
Inescapable Atlas: Storm Form
Necronomicon: Necromutation
Trismegistus Codex: Ignite Poison


See also

  • Transmuter

History

  • Transmutations was dissolved in 0.31. The form-changing spells were reworked into talismans and the other spells were merged with Poison Magic to create Alchemy.
  • 0.27 replaced Hydra Form with Storm Form. Transformations as a whole were affected by the GDR change.
  • 0.26 refitted Song of Slaying (Charms) to the transmutation Wereblood.
  • 0.25 removed Sticks to Snakes.
  • In early versions of Stone Soup, there were many more transmutations, such as Fulsome Distillation, Evaporate, and Alter Self.

The form-changing spells were reworked into [[talisman]]s and the other spells were merged with [[Poison Magic]] to create [[Alchemy]]. *[[0.27]] replaced [[Hydra Form]] with [[Storm Form]]. Transformations as a whole were affected by the [[GDR]] change. *[[0.26]] refitted [[Song of Slaying]] ([[Charms]]) to the transmutation [[Wereblood]]. *[[0.25]] removed [[Sticks to Snakes]]. *In early versions of Stone Soup, there were many more transmutations, such as [[Fulsome Distillation]], [[Evaporate]], and [[Alter Self]]. {{Skills}} [[Category:Transmutations|*]] [[Category:Magic skills]]
